entry.title: RESOLVED: Global: Dataflow Streaming jobs that interact with PubSub are experiencing failures.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-31 11:30 and ended at 2021-08-31 13:16 (all times are US/Pacific).

Global: Dataflow Streaming jobs that interact with PubSub experienced failures.

The issue with Cloud Dataflow has been resolved for all affected users as of Tuesday, 2021-08-31 13:22 US/Pacific.

For more information, please follow: https://status.cloud.google.com/incidents/5yL8cbrpS3ssbYjRZQJv

We thank you for your patience while we worked on resolving the issue.

Affected products: Google Cloud Dataflow

entry.title: UPDATE: Global: Dataflow Streaming jobs that interact with PubSub are experiencing failures.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-31 11:30 and ended at 2021-08-31 13:16 (all times are US/Pacific).

Summary: Global: Dataflow Streaming jobs that interact with PubSub are experiencing failures.

Description: We are experiencing an issue with Cloud Dataflow beginning at Tuesday, 2021-08-31 11:30 US/Pacific. Our engineering team continues to investigate the issue.

For regular status updates, please follow: https://status.cloud.google.com/incidents/5yL8cbrpS3ssbYjRZQJv where we will provide the next update by Tuesday, 2021-08-31 13:30 US/Pacific.

Diagnosis: Customers will experience lagging jobs/watermarks and failure in subscription creation.

Workaround: None at this time.

Affected products: Google Cloud Dataflow

entry.title: RESOLVED: Global: Cloud Pubsub experiencing elevated latencies and failures.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-31 11:59 and ended at 2021-08-31 14:17 (all times are US/Pacific).

The issue with Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Functions, and Dataflow has been resolved for all affected projects as of Tuesday, 2021-08-31 14:09 US/Pacific, 13:02 US/Pacific, and 13:16 US/Pacific respectively.

We thank you for your patience while we worked on resolving the issue.

Affected products: Google Cloud Pub/Sub

entry.title: UPDATE: Global: Cloud Pubsub experiencing elevated latencies and failures.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-31 11:59 and ended at 2021-08-31 14:17 (all times are US/Pacific).

Summary: Global: Cloud Pubsub experiencing elevated latencies and failures.

Description: The issue with Cloud Functions and Dataflow are now resolved and mitigation work is currently underway by our engineering team for Cloud Pub/Sub.

The mitigation is expected to complete by Tuesday, 2021-08-31 15:30 US/Pacific.

Cloud Pub/Sub:

  • Impact is ongoing
  • Customers may experience latencies creating subscriptions.
  • Customers are unavailable to lookup their backlog data.

Cloud Functions:

  • Impact resolved and customers should no longer experience errors with deployments

Dataflow:

  • Impact resolved and customers should no longer experience issues with jobs.

If you are still experiencing issues with Cloud Functions or Dataflow, please open a support case so we can work with you to resolve those issues.

We will provide more information by Tuesday, 2021-08-31 15:30 US/Pacific.

Diagnosis: Customers could experience elevated latencies and failures for Cloud Pub/Sub

Workaround: None at this time.

Affected products: Google Cloud Pub/Sub

entry.title: UPDATE: Global: Cloud Pubsub experiencing elevated latencies and failures.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-31 11:59 and ended at 2021-08-31 14:17 (all times are US/Pacific).

Summary: Global: Cloud Pubsub, Cloud Functions and Cloud Dataflow experiencing elevated latencies and failures.

Description: The issue with Cloud Functions and Dataflow are now resolved and mitigation work is currently underway by our engineering team for Cloud Pub/Sub.

We do not have an ETA for Cloud Pub/Sub mitigation at this point.

Cloud Pub/Sub:

  • Impact is ongoing
  • Customers may experience latencies creating subscriptions.
  • Customers are unavailable to lookup their backlog data.

Cloud Functions:

  • Impact resolved and customers should no longer experience errors with deployments

Dataflow:

  • Impact resolved and customers should no longer experience issues with jobs.

If you are still experiencing issues with Cloud Functions or Dataflow, please open a support case so we can work with you to resolve those issues.

We will provide more information by Tuesday, 2021-08-31 14:30 US/Pacific.

Diagnosis: Customers could experience elevated latencies and failures for Cloud Pub/Sub

Workaround: None at this time.

Affected products: Google Cloud Pub/Sub

entry.title: UPDATE: Global: Cloud Pubsub experiencing elevated latencies and failures.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-31 11:59 and ended at 2021-08-31 14:17 (all times are US/Pacific).

Summary: Global: Cloud Pubsub, Cloud Functions and Cloud Dataflow experiencing elevated latencies and failures.

Description: We are experiencing an issue with Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Functions and Cloud Dataflow beginning at Tuesday, 2021-08-31 11:30 US/Pacific.

Cloud Pub/Sub:

  • Customers may experience latencies creating subscriptions.
  • Customers are unavailable to lookup their backlog data.

Cloud Functions:

  • Users are experiencing errors with deployment

Dataflow:

  • Customers may experience lagging jobs/watermarks

Our engineering team continues to investigate the issue.

We will provide an update by Tuesday, 2021-08-31 13:30 US/Pacific with current details.

We apologize to all who are affected by the disruption.

Diagnosis: Customers could experience elevated latencies and failures for Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Functions and Dataflow jobs.

Workaround: None at this time.

Affected products: Google Cloud Pub/Sub
